title: "Winston is one of the game's most mobile Tanks,capable of crossing vast distances in a single leap"
body:
https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/745052895251472384/W3DMqiL8.jpg

http://cdn.blizzardwatch.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/10/overwatch-hero-dva.jpg

http://www.pcgamesn.com/sites/default/files/d.va_mech_2.jpg

What a joke.
Dva's ult does 1000 dmg AoE and can clear a point. 
Has perhaps even more mobility than Winston.
Her shield is more effective than winstons and on a lower cooldown
Does more damage, doesn't need to reload.
Has a "guardian angel". 


BUFF WINSTON.
